entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
